description: Tracks that echo civic tensions or unreported community issues. Logging these provides neutral civic insight.
Movies highlighting ignored or distorted local/global civic narratives. Nodes can reference and archive these patterns.
AI visualizations or text simulations reflecting civic themes, trends, or social gaps. Acts as witness, not editorial.
Social media signals that reflect civic sentiment, unnoticed patterns, or local-global parallels. Can be mirrored and mapped across nodes.
Tracking how an idea or story migrates across media types, regions, and nodes to identify patterns for observation and action.
